title: How should I store music on my 4a 5G?
content:
I know how to transfer music files via USB, but I need to know what are the best practices for storing music.
- Should music files be kept in the music folder WITH or WITHOUT being in subfolders?
- Can album art be deleted without bothering the music files?
- Can music files be kept in a folder other than the MUSIC folder?

Thanks much!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
